snippet.title: Turn It On! extended trailer
snippet.description:
Get it on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.RushingPixel.TIO ant the App Store: https://apps.apple.com/app/turniton/id1467732408
...or try the free version: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.RushingPixel.TIOfree / https://apps.apple.com/app/turn-it-on-lite/id1468056818

Rushing Pixel's very first game is about black boxes, where you have to use buttons, switches, wheels, knobs, handles, cogs, a handful of meters, displays, etc. to get the idea how those gadgets work. You will need to be smart enough to unlock all of them! Credits: idea, programming, and graphics by Balázs Oszvald, audio by Strayboom (www.strayboom.com)
